name: Spinny Ships
description:
A tiny arcade radial space shooter inspired by games such as Gyruss and Tempest. Developed over the course of a few weeks.

Features:
- 4 Different Weapons and 5 Different Powerups
- Dynamic difficulty scaling
- Procedural enemy patterns

PHOTOSENSITIVITY WARNING: This game features flashing lights which may cause seizure for a small percentage of people.

Credits: 

Jacob Sirotta:
-Design
-Sound Effects
-Programming
-Technical art
-UI Art

-UI Art
-Soundtrack
